titles.title: Solar Utilization Now Demonstration Act of 2007
SUN Act of 2007
To direct the Secretary of Energy to establish a photovoltaic demonstration program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Science and Technology

bill.summary: 6/27/2007--Introduced. Solar Utilization Now Demonstration Act of 2007 or the SUN Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of Energy to establish a program of grants to states to demonstrate advanced photovoltaic technology.
